name: Ultimate IceCream Maker
description:
Dress up and decorate a yummy ice cream with super deluxe toppings and lots of ice-cream and soft serve ice cream to choose from. Don't forget to top your delicious creation with tons of cute sweet bunnies, fruit and more!

  • Tons of toppings and ice cream scoops to choose from
  • Easy drag and drop interface for all ages
